title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 655 - Industrial Waste Treatment Facilities: Certification For Tax Purposes
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 655

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§17-0303, 17-0705, 17-0707

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
